metadata.title: CVE-2020-28282 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in 'getobject' version 0.1.0 allows anattacker to cause a denial of service and may lead to remote codeexecution.

criterions.comment: node-getobject: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
